_header: In all this world nis a merrier life
_description: On the Joys of being a bachelor — four quatrains (aaab) and burden: A, a, a, a, yet I love wherso I go

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
In all þis warld is a meryar lyfeþan is a ȝong man
                    with ovtyn a wyfe…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…þou beryst þi loue be hynd þi backIn euery
                    [place wherso þou go]
